resources.string: \t \tThe evolution of computing and Communications Technologies and their reliability in the different areas of the industry has changed completely the design of automated systems. Computing covers application of Computer Science to the mathematical modeling of complex systems in the field of Engineering and Sciences. Computing is interdisciplinary and application oriented, focusing on techniques and tools that enable computational simulations to be performed.\n \tThe vision today is to best utilize the media of communication. Communication processes are fundamental part of virtually every aspect of human computer interaction (HCI). Research on HCI or data communication takes you to the cutting-edge of research and theory in all areas with in the field of communication like exploration of communication processes, antecedents and consequences of communication in a broad range of network communication.\n"

Dr. Parma Nand Astya 
 
 Professor and Dean.
